get.description: Fetch all annotation for the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of resources to be loaded in a single request

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting point from which resource is to be loaded

post.description: Creates a new annotation in the given bookmark

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

data.description: Base64 encoded annotation data used to highlight the annotation text

text.description: Annotated text by the user in a bookmark

version.description: Version of highlighter used to create the annotation data

source.description: Version of highlighter used to create the annotation data

get.description: Find annotation based on the ids

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

post.description: Updates an existing annotation

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

post.description: Adds the given tag to the annotation. If no such tag exist, then it is created

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

tags.description: List of tag name to attached to the bookmark.If no such tag exist, new tag will be created

delete.description: Removes the given tag from the annotation.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

tags.description: List of tag name to detached from the bookmark.If the tag doesn't already exist, there will be no effect

get.description: Fetch all tag for the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of resources to be loaded in a single request

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting point from which resource is to be loaded

post.description: Creates a new tag

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

parent.description: Id of the parent tag so that the newly created tag can be child of this tag.If null, then tag willbe a root tag

get.description: Find tag based on the ids

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids

post.description: Update an existing tag

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

delete.description: Deletes a tag. If it as child tag, then those will also get deleted

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

post.description: Move the tag position in the tag hierarchy. The tag can be made a root tag or child of some othertag

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

parent.description: Id of the parent tag so that the newly created tag can be child of this tag.If null, then the tagbecomes a root tag

get.description: Fetch all reminder for the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of resources to be loaded in a single request

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting point from which resource is to be loaded

post.description: Creates a new reminder in the given bookmark

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

date.description: Date and time on which user is to be reminded in RFC 3339 format

timezone.description: Timezone in which user would like the reminder to be notified.If no timezone is provided. this willnotify based on the current timezone the user is in

isRecurring.description: Defines if the reminder is recurring

bookmarkId.description: Id of the bookmark where reminded needs to be added

lang.description: Language in which message is defined

mmNotifyOffset.description: Time before which user is to be notified of this event

notifyType.description: Type of notification user would like to have

get.description: Find reminder based on the ids

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of ids

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

post.description: Updates an existing reminder

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: Unique key to identify the request

date.description: Date and time on which user is to be reminded in RFC 3339 format

timezone.description: Timezone in which user would like the reminder to be notified.If no timezone is provided. this willnotify based on the current timezone the user is in

mmNotifyOffset.description: Time before which user is to be notified of this event

notifyType.description: Type of notification user would like to have

post.description: Update an existing tag

syncToken.description: Sync Token to identify client current sync status

commands.description: Commands to be executed. The argument will be same as the rest api counterpart except here the args will contain resource id whenever required

syncId.description: Idempotency Key for the command. Same as Idempotency Key in the Rest API

tempId.description: Temporary id used by the client to create the resource

action.description: Type of action to be performed
